it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.model.players

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.model.players.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlienPlayer, HumanPlayer

    public abstract class Player
extends java.util.Observable
    The main class for the players. It contains all the attributes and methods to keep track of a single player's state.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    GerlandoSavio, Matteo Pagliari

      • hasMoved

        public boolean hasMoved()
        Returns:
        boolean that tells if the player has moved during this turn, used in the Spotlight action to decide the next state of the player.
